channel.title: Comments on: I Wish I’d Said That
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/i-wish-i-had-said-that/#comment-483">Wickedjulia</a>.
Thank you and LOL! Being a well-stocked travelling calligrapher, I can actually fulfill that request if you ever show up at my pub night!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Wickedjulia.

Thank you and LOL! Being a well-stocked travelling calligrapher, I can actually fulfill that request if you ever show up at my pub night!

item.title: By: Wickedjulia
item.dc:creator: Wickedjulia
item.description: That is brilliant. Especially the note passing bit. I want black paper with pastel glitter pens for my next munch
item.content:encoded: That is brilliant. Especially the note passing bit. I want black paper with pastel glitter pens for my next munch
